properties.areaDesc: Mississippi, MO; New Madrid, MO; Fulton, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 8:40PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...Missouri...Kentucky...

Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau...Thebes and New Madrid

.Recent heavy rainfall over the mid Mississippi River basin has caused
river levels to rise. Minor flooding is occurring at Cape Girardeau and
Thebes, and moderate flooding is forecast to develop early this week.
Crests are expected to occur on Wednesday. At New Madrid, minor flooding
is forecast to develop by Monday morning.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at New Madrid
* from late tonight until further notice.
* At  8:00 PM Sunday the stage was 33.4 feet.
* Flood Stage is 34.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by after midnight tomorrow and
continue to rise to near 38.0 feet by Saturday evening.
* Impact...At 38.0 Feet...Heavy agricultural damage begins.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
